column4: I'm running feisty with an ATI 9550, all drivers installed fine and appear to be working, however images and video have very poor quality. The ui seems unaffected, any thoughts?
Hello! I'm running Ubuntu 7.04 with an Nvidia 9200FX card. The drivers install and work just fine, however image and video quality is terrible, while the ui is fine. Any ideas?
you used the restricted drivers manager?
